FAQs.subheading: Curious about Access? Find answers to Frequently Asked Questions about our platform and how we can help you.

items.question: How do I get started with Access?
items.answer: Contact us via our website or email, and our team will guide you through the process. We’ll assess your needs and recommend the best solution for your institution, whether it’s the Startup Plan or a custom Enterprise solution.

SERVICES.subheading: Partner with us to deliver innovative, scalable systems that empower your Institution to thrive in a rapidly changing world.

more.title: What we do:

heading.text: Crafting the Right Solutions for You

more.subheading: We deliver custom system solutions to help institutions run smoothly and efficiently, so they can focus on their core goals.

items.name: ACCESS School Management System
items.description: The AccessPH School Management System handles tasks like enrollment, grading, attendance, and finances, making it easier for schools to focus on teaching and student success.

details.heading: Made for Philippine Private Schools.
details.subheading: Every private school has its own standards, procedures, policies. The system can fit [or customized for] these varying setups.

details.heading: Integrate your existing systems. Let's connect everything.
details.subheading: ACCESS School System has an API where your developers can use to integrate with your existing systems. We can also develop along-side with your existing ones to easily integrate with ACCESS. BigData is inevitable.

details.heading: Don't let colors fool you. Define yours.
details.subheading: Design customizations -- system website and reports -- are already built-in.

details.heading: "Wait.... There's more."
details.subheading: Modules that can improve other schools can be developed with no additional charges. Upgrades and updates are automatically served to all deployments. We do love to improve your school system.

details.heading: Integrate your existing systems. Let's connect everything.
details.subheading: ACCESS School System has an API where your developers can use to integrate with your existing systems. We can also develop along-side with your existing ones to easily integrate with ACCESS. BigData is inevitable.

BLOGS.subheading: Sharing knowledge, sparking innovation, one post at a time

ABOUT.subheading: With technical and legal considerations while offering as a service to other schools, it was rather prepared as a commercial offering. Partnership with the defunct PCRx Computing Solutions (PCRx) was established late 2008 paving the way the second major modifications of the system and its features. In early 2017, ACCESS Software Solutions was registered as an independent business entity and offer ACCESS School Management System to Philippine private schools. This stage birthed a renewed structure of the system, its codes, modules, database, and templates -- making it more flexible to accommodate and integrate a wider range of solutions.
